body:
Fix the issues reported in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/24489

1. Rename nvhpc.patch to nvhpc-1.74.patch and limit it's application to Boost 1.74:1.75
2. Add nvhpc-1.76.patch to fix up the build scripts for Boost 1.76
3. Add nvhpc-find_address.patch to work around a NV compiler bug for some code introduced in Boost 1.75.0.  The bug has been reported to the NV compiler team.

Successfully tested with `spack install boost%nvhpc@21.5`, `spack install boost@1.75.0%nvhpc@21.5`, and `spack install boost@1.74.0%nvhpc@21.5`.
title: Update Boost package to support building the latest with the NV compilers
